correspondences.value:
1. Тебе нравиться работа на проэкт? Что самое классное/важное для тебя на этом месте?

На проекте мне нравится. Компания-заказчик устраивает фестивали и музыкальные тренинги, что интересно, хотя я к этому причастен только через постеры и баннеры для них. Еще мне нравится, что объем работ посильный и не очень много правок.

2. Какие основные задачи ты выполняешь изо дня в день, а какие редко?

Постеры и баннеры я делаю чаще всего, реже - презентации. Изредка для тех же баннеров я рисую иллюбстрированных персонажей.


3. Есть ли у тебя миты вместе с командой или только переписка/звонки с заказчиком? (укажи, пожалуйста, что именно и как часто проходят эти встречи). Если встреч нет, напиши нужны ли они/хотелось бы чтобы они были и как часто?

Миты заказчики проводят без меня, а я от них только получаю задания по имейлу. Иногда в треде на почте сидят несколько человек и дают мне праки, это почти что групповой чат.


4. Тебе есть к кому обратиться за помощью в компании? Понятны ли требования и задачи?

За помощью мне еще не приходилось обращаться.


5. Как ты считаешь, какое отношение к тебе в этой компании? Прислушивается ли заказчик к твои просьбам/пожеланиям?

Я думаю, что заказчики ко мне относятся хорошо и мы друг другом довольны. У меня к ним не было каких-то особых пожеланий, разве что когда мне нужен выходной или когда у РХ выходные, я их извещаю, и они не против.


6. С кем ты на связи в нашей компании Remote Employees, например твой тим лид или хеад оф? (укажи, пожалуйста, с кем именно и как часто проходят созвоны/переписка. Нужно ли чаще?)

С тимлидом в РХ я общаюсь обычно чтобы мне дали пароль от dd или от какого-нибудь еще аккаунта компании, это происходит редко и чаще нет надобности.


7. Если что-то не так в работе на проэкте, напиши, пожалуйста, подробнее! Смело пиши все свои пожелания, что хочешь улучшить. 

В общем, на проекте мне всё нравится.

Довольны ли вы работой в компании? да (развернутое и аргументированное)

Видите ли вы себя в компании через год? Да

Хотели бы вы взять дополнительные пол ставки? Нет

Могли бы вы провести урок для сотрудников за бонус? Нет 

Если да, то какой именно урок? - 

Где вам удобнее получать информацию от компании Discord

Напишите свою актуальную email почту и дайте знать если у вас изменился контактный номер телефона  ntwilson666@gmail.com

Как у тебя дела на проэкте? тебе нравится? какие задачи выполняешь? заказчик хороший, прислушивается к тебе?

Привет! У меня по-прежнему всё хорошо, на проекте нравится. Я всё так же рисую баннеры, постеры, брошюры. Заказчики хорошие, особо не мучают правками. И тебе спасибо!

Как у тебя дела на проэкте? тебе нравится? какие задачи выполняешь? какие отношения с заказчиком?

Привет. Дела по-прежнему. На проекте задачи такие же, как были: постеры, баннеры, брошюры. Заказчики довольны, мне тоже нравится

Как у тебя дела на проэкте? тебе нравится? какие задачи выполняешь? какие отношения с заказчиком? На какой позиции ты работаешь?

На проекте работаю как иллюстратор, делаю  постеры, баннеры, брошюры для музыкальных мероприятий. Заказчики довольны, мне тоже нравится, постоянная связь с ними по емейл.

work_experiences.responsibilities:
1. Designing and Crafting Prompts

  • Develop effective, precise, and creative prompts to guide AI models (such as ChatGPT, Midjourney, DALL-E, etc.) toward desired outputs.

  • Tailor prompts to various use cases, from customer support to content generation and data analysis.

2. Testing and Iterating

  • Experiment with different prompt variations to optimize output quality, accuracy, and relevance.

  • Continuously test, analyze, and refine prompts based on AI responses and feedback.

3. Analyzing Model Outputs

  • Evaluate AI responses for accuracy, bias, tone, and usefulness.

  • Identify and troubleshoot issues like hallucinations, inconsistencies, or undesired outputs.

4. Collaboration

  • Work with data scientists, developers, designers, and stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver effective AI solutions.

  • Provide documentation and best practices for using and modifying prompts.

5. Documentation

  • Maintain clear records of prompt iterations, test cases, and performance metrics.

  • Create guidelines and reference materials for prompt design and deployment.

6. Staying Updated

  • Keep up with advancements in AI models, prompt engineering strategies, and industry trends.

  • Experiment with new models, tools, and APIs to improve prompt engineering practices.

7. Automation and Tooling

  • Develop scripts or tools to automate testing or evaluation of prompts.

  • Integrate prompt engineering workflows into larger AI/ML pipelines or software products.

8. Ethical and Responsible AI

  • Ensure that prompts and resulting outputs align with ethical guidelines and do not reinforce biases or generate harmful content.

candidate.sub_titles:
Hello! My name is Vladyslav Perederii. I’m 23 and I live in wonderful city of Kharkiv.


All of my professional experience has been fully remote. I’m comfortable working independently. I don't have a problem staying focused, and delivering results is my priority. 


From 2021 to 2023, I worked remotely as an Account Manager  in a digital marketing studio. 

Later, I became a Team Leader Assistant in the same company, where I managed a small Lead Generation team and worked on improving onboarding process for new team members.

Currently, I work as a Customer Support and Engagement Specialist at an international dating agency, where I focus on communicating with clients and ensuring high service quality in all kinds of situations.


I have a degree in cybersecurity from Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics. I’m a native Ukrainian speaker and I know English at a Upper-Intermediate level. Additionally, I took  a programming course in Python at Mate Academy. I haven't completed the full course yet due to high workload, but i am planning to finish it in the near future. 


I use AI tools on a daily basis — not just in work, but in my everyday life as well. I primarily use ChatGPT, and also explore tools like Gemini and DeepSeek. I've also tried some other models like text-to-image solutions such as Midjourney and Stable Diffusion and text-to-video products like Kling, Runway, Veo 2, but I didn’t find a use-case that corresponds with my current needs.  I've been trainig to write complex but clear prompts, and I've already learned core prompt engineering startegies such as zero-shot, few-shot, role-based prompting and CoT (Chain of Thought). This was by far the greatest investment  in my AI journey and incresead the quality of the output.


In my free time, I enjoy activities that challenges me — like programming, solving puzzles, and playing chess. These hobbies help me not only to relax but also to stay relevent and open-minded


Thank you all for your attention. I am realy exitied for this opportunity and looking forward to receiving your feedback.

Відповідальний спеціаліст з розвитку клієнтів та управління соціальними медіа із 3+ роками досвіду в цифровому маркетингу та міжнародній підтримці клієнтів. Володію гнучкими навичками вирішення задач, командною 

координацією та глибоким розумінням побудови комунікацій. Шукаю 

можливість застосувати свій досвід у динамічній стартап-або технологічній команді. 

Ключові компетенції 

- Робота з клієнтами та їх 

залучення 

- Органічне просування у 

соцмережах (Instagram/Facebook) - Запуск контентних кампаній 

- Адміністрування рекламних 

акаунтів (Meta Business Manager) - Операційне управління командами - Адаптація та навчання нових 

співробітників 

- Вирішення конфліктів через діалог - Швидке копірайтинг і ідейна 

ітерація 

- Базовий досвід роботи з AI 

платформами 

Технічні навички 

Meta Business Manager (базовий рівень), Instagram Ads (базовий рівень), Facebook Ads (базовий 

рівень), Google Docs, базові знання Python, базові знання різних AI платформ (ChatGPT, Gemini, 

DeepSeek) 

Освіта 

Бакалавр, Кібербезпека – ХНУРЕ, Харків 

2019 - 2023 

Досвід роботи 

Менеджер акаунтів / Молодший фахівець із розвитку, Бутик-студія цифрового маркетингу — Віддалено *2021 – 2023* 

- Створював та вів акаунти у соцмережах із використанням емуляторів ОС для оптимізації охоплення. 

- Виконував контент-плани та просував акаунти у спільнотах Facebook та Instagram. 

- Працював із рекламними акаунтами через Business Manager після їх верифікації. 

- Швидко та ефективно вирішував технічні й організаційні проблеми. 

- Багаторазово визнавався "Працівником місяця". 

Асистент керівника команди, Бутик-студія цифрового маркетингу — Віддалено 

*2022 – 2023* 

- Керував щоденними процесами роботи команди. - Розробляв програми адаптації та навчання нових співробітників. 

- Підтримував культуру відкритої комунікації та вирішення задач. 

Фахівець із підтримки клієнтів та залучення, Міжнародна агенція знайомств — Віддалено 

*2024 – 2025* 

- Вів міжнародну клієнтську базу, будуючи довірливі комунікації. 

- Мотивував клієнтів до активної взаємодії та підтримував високу залученість. 

- Забезпечував високу якість обслуговування навіть у складних умовах. 

Проекти / Ключові досягнення 

- Самостійно створив та просунув понад 300 акаунтів у різних нішах, забезпечивши стабільний приріст залученості. 

- Розробив та впровадив ефективний план навчання для новачків, скоротивши час адаптації на 30%. 

Мови 

Українська (рідна), 

Англійська (B2)

Інтереси 

Шахи, програмування, розв'язання головоломок.
hr_details.sub_titles:
Hello! My name is Vladyslav Perederii. I’m 23 and I live in wonderful city of Kharkiv.


All of my professional experience has been fully remote. I’m comfortable working independently. I don't have a problem staying focused, and delivering results is my priority. 


From 2021 to 2023, I worked remotely as an Account Manager  in a digital marketing studio. 

Later, I became a Team Leader Assistant in the same company, where I managed a small Lead Generation team and worked on improving onboarding process for new team members.

Currently, I work as a Customer Support and Engagement Specialist at an international dating agency, where I focus on communicating with clients and ensuring high service quality in all kinds of situations.


I have a degree in cybersecurity from Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics. I’m a native Ukrainian speaker and I know English at a Upper-Intermediate level. Additionally, I took  a programming course in Python at Mate Academy. I haven't completed the full course yet due to high workload, but i am planning to finish it in the near future. 


I use AI tools on a daily basis — not just in work, but in my everyday life as well. I primarily use ChatGPT, and also explore tools like Gemini and DeepSeek. I've also tried some other models like text-to-image solutions such as Midjourney and Stable Diffusion and text-to-video products like Kling, Runway, Veo 2, but I didn’t find a use-case that corresponds with my current needs.  I've been trainig to write complex but clear prompts, and I've already learned core prompt engineering startegies such as zero-shot, few-shot, role-based prompting and CoT (Chain of Thought). This was by far the greatest investment  in my AI journey and incresead the quality of the output.


In my free time, I enjoy activities that challenges me — like programming, solving puzzles, and playing chess. These hobbies help me not only to relax but also to stay relevent and open-minded


Thank you all for your attention. I am realy exitied for this opportunity and looking forward to receiving your feedback.

candidate.note: Адекватнные запросы. Yaroslav Klymenko is a fourth-year Computer Science student from Kharkiv National University of Radioelectronics with a passion for full-stack development, especially frontend. He has experience working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL on the backend. Yaroslav recently explored Next.js and GraphQL. He completed a frontend internship at Evoplay in 2025, where he helped develop landing pages and interactive UI components. Yaroslav is a fast learner, detail-oriented, and motivated to contribute to impactful projects while continuously improving his skills. He is now looking for opportunities to grow and collaborate within a team.
candidate.sub_titles:
Hi, My name is Yaroslav Klymenko, and I’m a fourth-year student at Kharkiv National University of Radioelectronics, majoring in Computer Science.

I specialize in full-stack development, but my main focus and passion lie in frontend. I really enjoy building modern, clean, and user-friendly interfaces using React and related technologies.

Over time, I’ve become confident working with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React on the frontend, and Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL on the backend. I also use Git daily and follow best practices for clean code and teamwork.

Recently, I’ve started exploring Next.js and GraphQL, and I find them really powerful. I strive to learn something new every day, whether it's a new framework, pattern, or just a small improvement in how I work.

Some of my key strengths include being a fast learner, a team player, and very detail-oriented. I’m self-motivated, always open to feedback, and I enjoy solving problems creatively.

In 2025, I completed a frontend internship at Evoplay, where I helped develop landing pages and interactive UI components. I worked closely with designers to ensure high visual quality and a smooth user experience.

Now, I’m looking for opportunities where I can grow further, keep learning, and contribute to impactful projects as part of a team.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to working with you.

Summary:
Yulia is a 21-year-old UI/UX designer from Ukraine and a graduate of an art school. She has six months of experience from a design internship where she redesigned iOS applications, as well as freelance experience in graphic design, creating branded packaging. She is currently expanding her skills through independent study of Figma and is passionate about creating digital illustrations. Yulia is a motivated and detail-oriented individual with experience in both remote and team-based work environments.
candidate.sub_titles:
Hello! My name is Yulia and I am 21 years old. I am a UI/UX designer from Ukraine.


I have six months of experience as a designer thanks to an internship. I redesigned iOS applications and implemented new features to improve the user experience. I am currently undertaking independent study of Figma and creating website designs.


I also have experience as a freelance graphic designer. I have developed branded packaging, from selecting colour palettes to creating patterns and logos.


I am a graduate of art school and now spend my time creating digital illustrations in raster and vector graphics. I also run my own Instagram page, where I share my work and the design process.

Summary
Dana Bindyak is a 22-year-old graduate in English-Ukrainian translation from Chernivtsi with strong communication skills and a passion for learning. She has customer service experience in both Ukraine and the USA and is eager to explore remote work. Currently studying design as a hobby, she’s also proficient in ChatGPT and basic digital tools. Dana is a responsible, curious, and people-oriented person ready to grow in a professional, international environment.
candidate.sub_titles: Hello everybody! My name is Dana, I`m 22 years old and I live in Chernivtsi region in Ukraine. Since I was 16 years old i always wanted to achieve some kind of fulfillment or realization, so i started to work early. I was working as a server and barman. Also I have experience of working in USA. I had been living there for one year. There I was working for a Hostess position in the restaurant. My main responsibilities were to communicate with customers, give them some kind of instructions or just answer all the questions they had. I don`t have experience of working remotely, but I know a lot of people do that, so I also want to try it. This year I have graduated from Chernivetskyi National University, my specialization sounds as English to Ukrainian translation. Now I know I don`t have the highest level of English but I try to make it better every time so that is why I really enjoy the communication with people from foreign countries. Also last time I`m pretty interested in design I`m even taking a design course now. But I just started so for now it`s more just like a hobby. I suppose I`m pretty responsible, creative and communicative person. It`s easy for me to get acknowledged with stranger and even being a friend and as well I`m a person who really enjoy to learn something new. I speak Ukrainian as a native, also I speak Russian and English. I know how to work with basic Windows programs and I know for sure what is ChatGPT and I know how to use it to take advantage from it. For now that`s it, I thank you for your attention and hope we`ll keep in touch.

Summary:
Anastasia Pasichna is a 23-year-old from Dnipro with a degree in Economics and over three years of remote work experience at A-Bank. She progressed from a Validator to a Transaction Monitoring Specialist, where she developed strong analytical skills in fraud prevention and data handling. Alongside her banking experience, Anastasia has a creative passion for 3D modeling, is proficient with Blender and Photoshop, and has completed courses in AI content creation.
candidate.note_admin: For the accounting department, just check their salary expectations first.
candidate.sub_titles:
Hi!

My name is Anastasia, I am 23 years old. I from Dnipro.


I worked in a bank for more than three years, remotely.


I worked for about 4 months as a "Validator", verifying documents. Then I got a promotion and then worked as a "Transaction Monitoring Specialist", where I called clients, checked card transactions and prevented fraud.


I successfully graduated from college with a degree in "Food Industry Technician", then from university with a degree in "Economics".

I completed several courses, such as "Programming Basics" and "Blender". I also studied AI content creation tools.


I am improving my English and actively working on its level. I am also learning Spanish and hope to reach a good level soon.


I am looking for a job in a stable company where I can grow professionally, contribute to the team's success and continue reaching new heights. I will be glad to become a part of your team and contribute to the development!

Summary:
Anastasia Pasichna is a 23-year-old from Dnipro with a degree in Economics and over three years of remote work experience at A-Bank. She progressed from a Validator to a Transaction Monitoring Specialist, where she developed strong analytical skills in fraud prevention and data handling. Alongside her banking experience, Anastasia has a creative passion for 3D modeling, is proficient with Blender and Photoshop, and has completed courses in AI content creation.
hr_details.note_admin: For the accounting department, just check their salary expectations first.
hr_details.sub_titles:
Hi!

My name is Anastasia, I am 23 years old. I from Dnipro.


I worked in a bank for more than three years, remotely.


I worked for about 4 months as a "Validator", verifying documents. Then I got a promotion and then worked as a "Transaction Monitoring Specialist", where I called clients, checked card transactions and prevented fraud.


I successfully graduated from college with a degree in "Food Industry Technician", then from university with a degree in "Economics".

I completed several courses, such as "Programming Basics" and "Blender". I also studied AI content creation tools.


I am improving my English and actively working on its level. I am also learning Spanish and hope to reach a good level soon.


I am looking for a job in a stable company where I can grow professionally, contribute to the team's success and continue reaching new heights. I will be glad to become a part of your team and contribute to the development!

Her work is very average, honestly, a complete beginner. It really reminds me of another girl we interviewed before. I can’t recall her name, but the style is very similar.
Maybe it’s because they finished the same courses. Still, she has decent English, can use Photoshop and Illustrator, and also works with AI tools. candidate.sub_titles:
My name is Eleonora Safonova

I’m an UX/UI designer. 


Coming to my skills, I know how to design landing pages, web sites and mobile apps. 


At GoIT school, I worked on redesign and adaptive design, made wireframes and mockups, tested usability, improved UX, used colors and typography, created interactive elements, and practiced with design systems.


I did 5 projects, some of which I worked on in a team. 


Also, I have mastered Figma, Adobe Photoshop. 


About my soft skills… I’m results-oriented, responsible, flexible, creative, and detail-oriented.


I often use AI tools and websites. ChatGPT helps me a lot with design, and I also use AI websites to generate vectors, create frames, remove backgrounds, and make color palettes.


I speak Russian and Ukrainian well, and my English is at B1–B2 level. I am also learning German, currently at A2 level.


I chose your company because I really like your innovative approach with artificial intelligence. I believe that in your team I can continue to develop my skills, while also bringing value and helping the company to grow.



Thank you for considering me.

RemotEmployees_Viktoriia, [29.08.2025 14:16]
Дякуємо за ваш інтерес до Remote Employees ????

Remote Employees — це аутстафф-компанія, що надає робочі місця в Україні для проєктів у ЄС та США.

???? Графік роботи:
Після проходження онбордингу ви зможете обрати зручну зміну:
▪️ 09:00–18:00 (1 год перерви)
▪️ 15:00–24:00
Робочі дні — пн–пт, вихідні — субота, неділя та офіційні свята.

???? Заробітна плата:
▪️ Виплати — 2 рази на місяць
▪️ Передбачено перегляд з/п та карʼєрне зростання

Етапи відбору:
1️⃣ Онлайн-тест з англійської (10–15 хв)
2️⃣ Коротка відеовізитка (2–3 хв)
3️⃣ Співбесіда з керівником відділу

Якщо вам підходять умови — я надішлю посилання на тест, і ми зможемо розпочати ????

???? Якщо виникнуть запитання — пишіть, із задоволенням відповім ????

Eleonora, [01.09.2025 16:17]
Доброго дня! так мені все підходить.

RemotEmployees_Viktoriia, [01.09.2025 16:48]
Прекрасно! Надсилаю посилання на короткий онлайн-тест з англійської:
???? https://forms.gle/knuqogPtoZaEHfQ69

Займе близько 10–15 хв. Можна проходити з будь-якого пристрою.
Після проходження, будь ласка, напишіть мені тут ????

Eleonora, [01.09.2025 18:29]
Я пройшла тест)

RemotEmployees_Viktoriia, [01.09.2025 18:40]
Дякую, побачила ваш тест ???? Ви показали чудовий результат —  43/60!
Тож можемо переходити до наступного етапу — відеовізитки.

???? Будь ласка, запишіть відео (2–3 хв, горизонтально, англійською мовою), де розкажете:
• Хто ви, ваш досвід і освіта
• Ваші навички
• Чому вам цікава ця позиція
Якщо не складно, також напишіть текстом, що сказали, і надішліть разом із відео.

Summary:
Kibriyo Davlatdodova is a final-year student from Tajikistan, currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Finance with a minor in Financial Engineering in Astana, Kazakhstan. She has gained hands-on experience through her current role as an Audit Intern at PKF Tajikistan, where she is involved in the full audit process, including preparing financial statements and tax returns. In addition to her finance background, she has experience as a Project Coordinator for a consulting case club and is developing her skills in data science through courses in Python and machine learning.

Summary
Elizabeth is a native English-speaking translator and editor with over three years of teaching and language coaching experience. Her background in medicine gives her an edge in translating technical and scientific texts. She specializes in ensuring clarity, consistency, and accuracy in translated materials. She uses tools like Microsoft Office, Grammarly, and various AI aids. Known for her attention to detail, adaptability, and commitment to quality, she’s a quick learner who thrives in collaborative, deadline-driven environments.

Summary:
Joy Edem Asukowo is a 23-year-old from Calabar, Nigeria, with a BSc in Economics and hands-on experience in lead generation, marketing, and customer service. She has held roles as a Marketing Manager and Customer Service Representative at B2B Globy and is currently working as a Lead Generation Specialist for The Salt Group. Joy is proficient with a range of lead generation and CRM tools, including Apollo, Zoho CRM, and SalesQL, and uses AI assistants like ChatGPT in her workflow.

  • Collaborate with marketing to optimize lead generation strategies and improve conversion rates.

Summary
Valeria is a 20-year-old Political Science student from Lviv, currently in her third year at the Ukrainian Catholic University. She has gained practical experience in social media marketing through roles as an SMM manager for an Instagram shop, where she handled content strategy and targeted advertising, and as a copywriter for her university's student council page. Having completed an SMM course, Valeria is proficient with tools like Canva and Excel, has an upper-intermediate level of English, and is actively learning Spanish.

candidate.sub_titles:
Hi, my name is Bridget Aledare. I’m 20 years old and based in Abuja, Nigeria.


I worked as a Dispatcher and Customer Service Representative at Techvill Appliance Repair, managing 60+ daily customer interactions and scheduling appointments using CRM tools. Previously, I supported customers and handled billing at Orthodontic Expert.

I have a Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, which strengthened my attention to detail and ability to work under pressure. I’m tech-savvy, organized, and experienced with ServiceTitan, Ortho2, Microsoft Office, Grammarly, and ChatGPT.

I’m excited about this role, as I enjoy remote work,your team’s focus on support and international collaboration. Thank you for considering my application.
